name: health
description: Setting panel must be accessible and should display all the other panels that enable to set up the system.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the username in gnome status bar

steps.expected: A window which display all the settings panel must open

name: health-components
objective: Each panel and each tabs' panel of gnome conrol center is launchable
description: Open the setting panel, then iterate on icons, and open each tab. All panels must be accessible and their tabs too.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the username in gnome status bar

steps.expected: A window which display all the settings panel must open

steps.description: For each panel, click on the icon and select successively the different tabs (if there's tabs)
steps.expected: content of the window must change with and must be consistent with the opened panel/tab

name: locale-format
description: in settings panel select locale format sub-panel and then select a locale format. Check that it applies
